text: Bull and bear markets — historical trends and portfolio impact With market volatility a central concern among investors, it is important to review historical trends to put market volatility concerns into perspective. As shown in the chart below, bull/rising markets (shown in dark blue) have been longer and more sustained than bear/ declining markets (shown in light blue). The effect that market volatility has on your portfolio may be minimized with a long-term outlook and investment plan.
